label: First steps
description: The first step of any contributor is to get acquainted with the project and token mechanics. Complete all the tasks in this section, figure out how the project works, and get a POE. Tokens will be awarded when there are more than 2 POE.

label: Help the development of the project
description: Acquaintance made, now it's the time for your actions to help the development of the project. In this section you will receive tasks that will help the project to develop. Some tasks may require special qualifications, can be limited in time and execution, the payment will be commensurate with the effort. All special conditions will be specified. The tasks will be replenished, so don't forget to look here even after all the tasks are completed
